bold chunk

Source: R/05_content.R
as_b.Rd

The function is producing a chunk with bold font.

It is used to add it to the content of a cell of the flextable with the functions compose(), append_chunks() or prepend_chunks().

Usage

as_b(x)

Arguments

x

value, if a chunk, the chunk will be updated

See also

Other chunk elements for paragraph: as_bracket(), as_chunk(), as_equation(), as_highlight(), as_image(), as_i(), as_sub(), as_sup(), as_word_field(), colorize(), gg_chunk(), grid_chunk(), hyperlink_text(), linerange(), lollipop(), minibar(), plot_chunk()

Examples

ft <- flextable( head(iris),
  col_keys = c("Sepal.Length", "dummy") )

ft <- compose(ft, j = "dummy",
    value = as_paragraph(
      as_b(Sepal.Length)
    ) )

ft
